synopsis.text:
Al Wayne, a dedicated and ambitious farmer, has achieved his lifelong dream of becoming an elite cultivator. With unwavering determination, he has honed his farming skills to their maximum potential, earning him an unexpected boost in his overall abilities. This newfound power surpasses even that of legendary heroes, leading to an unforeseen turn of events in Al's peaceful life.

As disasters begin to strike the kingdom, the royal family seeks Al's help, believing his extraordinary strength to be their best hope against the escalating calamities. Although Al's primary desire is to tend to his beloved fields, he realizes that he must rise to the occasion to protect his land from the impending threats.

Reluctantly trading his plow for a sword, Al embarks on a journey to safeguard his home and maintain the harmony of his cherished farming life. Little does he know, his destiny now lies not only in the soil but also on the battlefield.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
